com.kuka.roboticsAPI.ioModel
Class AbstractIOGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.ioModel.AbstractIOGroup

public abstract class AbstractIOGroup
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for IO-groups.
